import "../assets/styles/style.css" import { cars } from "../src/mocks/cars"; function Card () { return( <> {cars.map((carros,index) =>

{carros.modelo}

#{carros.id}

{carros.descricao}

{carros.ano}

{carros.km} km

R$ {carros.preco}
adicionarItem(index)} >Adicionar
removerItem(index)} >Remover
)} ) } export default Card;
